show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Semi-Annual Report And Projections
content:
International tensions have escalated far more swiftly than I envisaged last December. American-instigated war with China and/or Russia has drawn suddenly closer than was apparent until the recent conflagrations in the Middle East.
America seems intent on declaring war against someone – anyone – anywhere.
‘Out-of-control’ best  describes the lunatics in Washington.
The entire global economy is turning down now, record stock-market highs notwithstanding.
How the Constitution has been subverted.
The lies surrounding GDP.
Singapore’s deputy Chairman of the MAS (Monetary Authority of Singapore) warns of an alarming build-up of risks destabilizing the global economies and that the world exists in uncharted waters.
